greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = pi(n+k) - pi(n) - pi(k), where pi() = A000720 (n >= 0, 0 <= k <= n).
comment: T(n,0)=0; for n > 0: T(n,1)=A010051(n); T(n,n)=-A060208(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 15 2008
A212210-A212213 are the preferred versions of this array.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
ext: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Dec 22 1999
